---
title: "Datasets"
---


## MDPI_journals

A dataframe with 430 journal titles and their respective sitemap codes.

::: callout-note
Last update: December 2023
:::


::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
MDPI_journals|>
  head(10)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
                               name            code
1                         Acoustics       acoustics
2                         Actuators       actuators
3           Administrative Sciences          admsci
4                       Adolescents     adolescents
5  Advances in Respiratory Medicine             arm
6                       Aerobiology     aerobiology
7                         Aerospace       aerospace
8                       Agriculture     agriculture
9                   AgriEngineering agriengineering
10                    Agrochemicals   agrochemicals
```
:::
:::


## Agriculture

A dataframe with information of papers of the journal MDPI Agriculture

::: callout-note
Last update: December 2023
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
agriculture|>
  head(5)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

2 https://www.mdpi.com/2077-0472/11/5/453       Review 2021-04-30 2021-05-14
3 https://www.mdpi.com/2077-0472/11/5/454      Article 2021-04-08 2021-05-16
4 https://www.mdpi.com/2077-0472/11/5/455      Article 2021-04-08 2021-05-15
5 https://www.mdpi.com/2077-0472/11/5/456      Article 2021-03-31 2021-05-14
      tat year    issue_type

2 14 days 2021 Special Issue
3 38 days 2021 Special Issue
4 37 days 2021 Special Issue
5 44 days 2021 Special Issue
```

:::

## Submit your data set

If you wish to submit your own MDPI journal data set for it to be part of the `MDPIexploreR` package, the best way is to send/push your `articles_info()` output via GitHub in `.rda` format.
